lst.name: sentence
lst.str: In the statement, Lloyds chief executive Brian Pitman said "We have a relatively small position in these two overcrowded markets and we have decided to reallocate the resources to opportunities which promise a better return on our shareholders' investment."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: It said in a statement it will maintain an active presence in short-term securities trading, swaps and other treasury products, building on its strengths in traditional foreign exchange and money markets.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Under the old system, the gilt market operated under a separate system which involved separate functions for jobbers and brokers.
